summary: When a bank is hit by a brutal heist, all evidence points to the owner and his high-powered clients. But as a group of FBI agents dig deeper into the case - and the deadly heists continue - it becomes clear that a larger conspiracy is at play.

Abeckaser|Texas Battle|Tara Holt|Alyshia Ochse|Carolyn Alise|Ryan O'Nan|David Gordon|Rico Simonini|Michael Urriquia|Torrie Wilson|Shea Buckner|Kristen Rae Myers|Joe Gelchion|John Dauer|Alora Catherine Smith|Charlotte Kirk|Jesse Pruett|Derek DuChesne|Martin Blencowe|Javier Sepulveda|Jon Galanis|Joseph Lazow|Cameron Brexler|Christopher Sileo|Kristina Powers|Caroline Lassiter|Stephanie Heinrich|Karen Strassman|Stuart Wilson|Eric Toulouse|Jonathan Yurco|Thom Allport|Brian Searle|James Carter|Aswan Harris|Will F. title: Los conspiradores
